    ---- shader ----

    var<private> x : i32;
    var<private> y : i32;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x, &x);
    }

    var<private> x : i32;
    var<private> y : i32;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x, &x);
    }

    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

      var y : i32;

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : i32;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : i32;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x, &x);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : i32;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : i32;

      return 0;
    }

    var<private> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {

      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

      callee(&x[1], &x[0]);

              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {

    ---- shader ----

    var<private> x : array<i32, 4>;
    var<private> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[0], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {


      index(&x, &x);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    var<private> x : array<i32, 4>;
    var<private> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {

    var<private> x : array<i32, 4>;
    var<private> y : array<i32, 4>;

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      return 0;

    ---- shader ----

    var<private> x : array<i32, 4>;
    var<private> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      { let tmp = *pa; }
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[0], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {

      *pa = 42;
      _ = abs(*pb);
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<private, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[1], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {


      index(&x, &x);
    }

    var<private> x : array<i32, 4>;

      return 0;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<function, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<function, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[0], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : array<i32, 4>;
      var y : array<i32, 4>;
      index(&x, &x);

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : array<i32, 4>;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      { var tmp : i32; tmp += *pb; }
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>,
             pb : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[0], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {


      index(&x, &x);

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : array<i32, 4>;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>,

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : array<i32, 4>;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      { let tmp = *pa; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>,
             pb : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[1], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {


      index(&x, &x);
    }

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : array<i32, 4>;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : array<i32, 4>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      switch(*pa) { default { break; } }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>,
             pb : ptr<storage, array<i32, 4>, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[1], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    fn caller() {


      index(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="switch_cond";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn index(pa : ptr<workgroup, array<i32, 4>>,
             pb : ptr<workgroup, array<i32, 4>>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa)[0], &(*pb)[0]);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      *pb += 1;

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="builtin_arg";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      switch(*pa) { default { break; } }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="switch_cond";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.


    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      switch(*pa) { default { break; } }
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      *pb++;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {

      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> y : S;

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa += 1;
      { return *pb; }
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      { var arr : array<i32, 4>; _ = arr[*pa]; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="index_access";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      { let tmp = *pa; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="let_init";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

      *pb += 1;
      return 0;

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      switch(*pb) { default { break; } }
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = 1 + *pa;
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;

      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      callee(&x.a, &x.a);

    }

              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="builtin_arg";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

      b : i32,

      b : i32,
    }

    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      *pa++;
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {

      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : S;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;

      return 0;

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = 1 + *pa;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.a, &x.a);

      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa++;
      { var tmp : i32; tmp += *pb; }
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="builtin_arg";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      { return *pa; }
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {


      callee(&x.b, &x.a);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      { var tmp : i32; tmp += *pb; }
      return 0;
    }

              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {

      return 0;

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="builtin_arg";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> y : S;

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa += 1;
      _ = abs(*pb);
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);

      b : i32,

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = -*pa;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {

    }

              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);

      return 0;

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<private> x : S;
    var<private> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>,
              pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      switch(*pa) { default { break; } }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<private, S>,
              pb : ptr<private, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

      var y : S;

      *pb++;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)

      *pb = 42;

              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {

    struct S {
      a : i32,

              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {

      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);

      var x : S;

      access(&x, &x);

              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      { var arr : array<i32, 4>; _ = arr[*pa]; }
      *pb++;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      access(&x, &x);
    }

    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      _ = 1 + *pb;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="assign";b_use="unary_minus"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="builtin_arg";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;

              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);

      var y : S;

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      { var arr : array<i32, 4>; _ = arr[*pa]; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<function, S>,
              pb : ptr<function, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {
      var x : S;
      var y : S;
      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="index_access";b_use="compound_assign_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

    struct S {

      b : i32,
    }




    fn callee(pa : ptr<function, i32>,
              pb : ptr<function, i32>) -> i32 {
      { var tmp = *pa; }
      *pb += 1;

              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      *pa++;
      _ = 1 + *pb;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<storage, S, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, S, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);

      b : i32,

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : S;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<storage, S, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, S, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : S;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      { let tmp = *pa; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<storage, S, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, S, read_write>) -> i32 {

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      { var tmp : i32; tmp += *pa; }
      *pb++;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<storage, S, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, S, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : S;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<storage, S, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, S, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);

    }

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : S;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>,
              pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {

      *pb++;

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

      access(&x, &x);
    }

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa += 1;
      switch(*pb) { default { break; } }
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)
  - INFO: subcase: a_use="compound_assign_rhs";b_use="no_access"
    OK

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = bitcast<f32>(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).a, &(*pb).a);

      b : i32,

      *pb = 42;
      return 0;

    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa = 42;
      *pb += 1;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      *pa++;
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

      at (elided: only 2 shown)

    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

    var<workgroup> y : S;

    ---- shader ----

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {

      switch(*pb) { default { break; } }
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

      access(&x, &x);

    var<workgroup> x : S;

              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      _ = abs(*pa);
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

    struct S {
      a : i32,
      b : i32,
    }

    var<workgroup> x : S;
    var<workgroup> y : S;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<workgroup, i32>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, i32>) -> i32 {
      { var arr : array<i32, 4>; _ = arr[*pa]; }
      *pb = 42;
      return 0;
    }

    fn access(pa : ptr<workgroup, S>,
              pb : ptr<workgroup, S>) -> i32 {
      return callee(&(*pa).b, &(*pb).a);
    }

    fn caller() {


      access(&x, &x);
    }

      return 0;

    ---- shader ----

    var<private> x : i32;
    var<private> y : i32;

    fn subcall_no_access(p : ptr<private, i32>) {
      let pp = &*p;
    }

    fn subcall_binary_lhs(p : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      return *p + 1;
    }

    fn subcall_assign(p : ptr<private, i32>) {
      *p = 42;
    }

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>, pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      let new_pa = &*pa;
      let new_pb = &*pb;
      subcall_assign(new_pa);
      subcall_assign(new_pb);
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {
      callee(&x, &x);
    }

    ErrorWithExtra@http://127.0.0.1:8000/webgpu/common/util/util.js:23:10
    expectCompileResult@http://127.0.0.1:8000/webgpu/webgpu/shader/validation/shader_validation_test.js:28:37
    @http://127.0.0.1:8000/webgpu/webgpu/shader/validation/functions/alias_analysis.spec.js:374:24
  - VALIDATION FAILED: subcase: a_use="assign";b_use="binary_lhs"
    Missing expected compilationInfo 'error' message.

    var<private> x : i32;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>, pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {

      subcall_assign(new_pa);

      return 0;

      callee(&x, &x);

    }

    fn subcall_assign(p : ptr<private, i32>) {
      *p = 42;
    }

    fn callee(pa : ptr<private, i32>, pb : ptr<private, i32>) -> i32 {
      let new_pa = &*pa;
      let new_pb = &*pb;
      subcall_binary_lhs(new_pa);

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : i32;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : i32;

    fn subcall_no_access(p : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) {
      let pp = &*p;
    }

    fn subcall_binary_lhs(p : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      return *p + 1;
    }

    fn subcall_assign(p : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) {
      *p = 42;
    }

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>, pb : ptr<storage, i32, read_write>) -> i32 {
      let new_pa = &*pa;
      let new_pb = &*pb;
      subcall_assign(new_pa);
      subcall_assign(new_pb);
      return 0;
    }

    fn caller() {
      callee(&x, &x);
    }

    ---- shader ----

    @binding(0) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> x : atomic<i32>;
    @binding(1) @group(0) var<storage, read_write> y : atomic<i32>;

    fn callee(pa : ptr<storage, atomic<i32>, read_write>, pb : ptr<storage, atomic<i32>, read_write>) {
      var i : i32;
      i += atomicLoad(pa);
      atomicStore(pb, 42);
    }

    fn caller() {
      callee(&x, &x);
    }
